AppBot Documentation


Welcome


Welcome to the AppBot Documentation! 
 

Invite the bot to your server by clicking the image below. 
 


 
 

Make sure to join 
the support server
 if you ever need any help.
 

If you want to donate and make the bot better 
click here
 

To keep the bot developers encouraged to keep the bot, vote for the bot by 
clicking here

docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Welcome to the AppBot Documentation!    
Invite the bot to your server by clicking the image below.         
Make sure to join  the support server  if you ever need any help.   
If you want to donate and make the bot better  click here   
To keep the bot developers encouraged to keep the bot, vote for the bot by  clicking here
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: Getting Started  First Application    Commands  Administrator Commands  Member Commands  Extra Commands
docs.title: Content

docs.text:
Getting Started


Making your first application


Thank you for adding AppBot to your server. This section of the documentation will explain how to set up your first application.


Step One
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Thank you for adding AppBot to your server. This section of the documentation will explain how to set up your first application.
docs.title: Making your first application

docs.text:
Commmands


Administrator Commands



The following commands are for users with either the Administrator permission, or for people who have the application reviewing/editing role (if set).








Command


Description










/config


If no applications have been created, this command will create your first one. Otherwise, it's used to create another application, edit the questions of an application, or to reset the bot.
























Member Commands


 
All users without either the Administrator permission, or without the application-reviewing role (if set) are considered members.








Command


Description


Usage
































Extra Commands



These commands are not shown in the regular help command provided the bot.








Command


Description


Usage
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: The following commands are for users with either the Administrator permission, or for people who have the application reviewing/editing role (if set).     Command  Description      /config  If no applications have been created, this command will create your first one. Otherwise, it's used to create another application, edit the questions of an application, or to reset the bot.
docs.title: Administrator Commands

docs.text: All users without either the Administrator permission, or without the application-reviewing role (if set) are considered members.     Command  Description  Usage
docs.title: Member Commands

docs.text: These commands are not shown in the regular help command provided the bot.     Command  Description  Usage
docs.title: Extra Commands

docs.text:
Changelogs





Updates


AppBot is always getting updated, to make it easier for you to know what's getting updated, the change logs are listed here.


Version 1.6.7 - 
/mydata
 minor bug fix




Fixed a bug whre applications without an autorole set would create a bug




Version 1.6.6 - 
/mydata




Added 
/mydata
 for server's applications




Version 1.6.5 - Caps Bug Fix




Fixed a bug where caps while editing an application would make it uneditable




Version 1.6.4 - Application Name Editing




Application names can now be edited




Version 1.6.3 - Logs Bug




Fixed a bug where accepted applications wouldn't get logged or archieved




Version 1.6.2 - 
/register
 enhanced




If you're using the bot as a register bot, 
/reister
 will now make more sence. Instead of something like "Apply for Position", it'll be changed to "Register for position" based off of the command invoked.




Version 1.6.1 - Bug fix




Fixed a minor bug where trying to whitelist a role before blacklisting would cause a bug to occur




Version 1.6.0 - Major bug fixes and minor changes and updates




Fixed a major lasting bug where timing out while creating an application would create a permanently bugged application


Fixed a major lasting bug where you can review an application while the applier was still creating the application


Added 
/help <command>
 to view a specific command's description


Made 
/format
 and 
/apps
 in the same channel rather than in a DM


Changed "amount" to "num_of_qns" in the usage for 
/app create
(Less confusing)


Added 
/register
 alias for 
/apply




Version 1.5.5 - Minor bug fixes




Un-unupdated an update where the cool down message should've sent


Another minor change




Version 1.5.4 - Major Security Bug Fix




Fixed a bug where members without permissions can use 
/app
 subcommands




Version 1.5.3 - Archived Applications




Added 
/setarchieves <channel>
 - set a channel where a copy of applications get sent to the end, after an app gets reviewed


Fixed the message in command cooldown - The bot was supposed to send a message if you ran a command while it was on cooldown




Version 1.5.2


Closed applications will now be crossed out 
like this
 in 
/app list
 and 
/apply
